description:
how wonderful to remember every moment in your life .when you see a picture taken 10 years ago ,sure you will feel pleasure remembering these moments.
how cool for your child seeing his childhood moments.
your wedding,your babies smile,your birthday.........., not only yours but  also for  people you love will be saved into albums to get them one day.
wait for new features.
waiting your feed back , modifications and suggestions at (palmsupport@razysoft.com) .
